the pride parade in full swing .
people cooling off in the fountain even though it says it 's dirty .

output.sentences: We went to a cool parade today.
There were so many people all around in the streets too.
A dog decided it was a good time to take a bath break.
My friends and I stopped for some drinks at the parade drink truck.
We ended the night with a little wine, and a lot of smiles.
